Question.Subject: Windos internet explorer wont work?
Question.Content: every time i open explorer it give me " Internet Explorer cannot display the webpage" and then i refresh it and it works again then somethimes i am watching youtobe and it playes the first 5 sec and it says loading and it never loads then , i refresh it and it does the same thing i am tireeeeeee. i formatted my pc 2 time nnow and this issue is same can someone help plz
Question.ChosenAnswer: Why is ANYONE still using that crap that is called Internet Explorer? It is so glitchy and will never work properly. Switch to Firefox!

Answer.Content: Why is ANYONE still using that crap that is called Internet Explorer? It is so glitchy and will never work properly. Switch to Firefox!
You could try reinstalling Internet Explorer, but Ashley is right, mozilla firefox and google chrome are both MUCH better web browsers
Internet Explorer sucks I didn't think people still used it. Opera 10, Firefox, and Safari are so much better
